description: Pre-cooked lentils make this summery salad quick and easy to whip up, perfect with griddled halloumi and lots of zingy lemon.
keywords: Lentil salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Egg free,Lemon,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Spinach
name: Lentil, Lemon & Grilled Halloumi Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the ingredients for the dressing together in a small bowl, using 1 teaspoon of lemon zest.
Heat the lentils according to pack instructions. Heat a griddle pan on medium heat and cook the halloumi for 2 minutes on each side, until crisp and golden.
Toss the spring onions, spinach, pomegranate seeds and lentils together in a large bowl and mix in the dressing. Divide between 4 plates, top with griddled halloumi and extra coriander, if desired.
